message.body: 12th st Sunday school if you want to come
At Eric & Andy's. Probably heading out soon; I'll ask if they wanna come.
I'm doing a quick buzz past tria for lost abbey.
PS. What is the proper way to punctuate the last message? I just gave up on cramming a question mark in there.
I gotta deal with a flat & go grocery shopping, but thanks! Quotation marks & a ? if you want to be proper, I guess!Â
